ygData.msgSnippet: ... I gotta tell you something about regaining concentration - I do it almost certainly EVERY battle and sometimes twice and more. I am level 16 (just leveled)
ygData.messageBody:
"Marziani, Michael D." wrote:

> From: "Marziani, Michael D." <Michael.Marziani@...>
>
> How about this one?

I gotta tell you something about regaining concentration - I do it almost
certainly EVERY battle and sometimes twice and more. I am level 16 (just
leveled) so all my experiences with regaining were up to 16. My wisdom is 95,
dexterity 85 or 90 (don't remember). Anyway, the most I regain when casting
root. I almost always get the root off if I'm hit once or twice, for not very
high damage. Sometimes when I hit for very high damage too. As I told, I once
gated with TWO gnolls hitting on me. Regaining concentration may be one of the
unknown wizard advantages. Do other classes get it? Are they as successful?

--
Sergey
--
KPS PUNK (Paramilitary Undercover Nuclear Kamikaze)
